subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Hefner was rocky over five innings while rookie center fielder Bryce Harper sparked the Nationals’ offense. The Mets went 2-4 in a six-game trip that started in Cincinnati.
snippet: Jeremy Hefner was rocky over five innings while rookie center fielder Bryce Harper sparked the Nationals’ offense. The Mets went 2-4 in a six-game trip that started in Cincinnati.
